name: Suhsi Flip
description:
You liked Voltorb Flip? Then you're gonna love the Sushi Flip,  gain point by turning 2 and 3 cards and avoiding other Sushi cards.

This prototype was made in few days on spare times and I planning to improve to make it a real game (maybe even release it on the Play Store it would be cool)

Check my portfolio here: https://www.forestiergames.fr/
